Heading.name: Open Source
Heading.Info: The original code for Play is freely available and can be modified

Heading.name: IDE and tooling support for Java and IntelliJ IDEA
Heading.Info: Compiles Java and Scala source directly

Heading.name: Reactive
Heading.Info: Paradigm used to create interactive and dynamic web applications
Play supports Non blocking IO and real-time web

Heading.name: Non blocking IO
Heading.Info: Nothing on the server is ever blocked
If the result depends on an extensive computation then only the requesting client will be blocked while waiting for the response
Server will return the promise of result
Play will serve this result as soon as the promise is redeemed

Heading.name: Real-time web
Heading.Info: Uses websockets instead of Comet sockets
Useful for web applications that require bi-directional communication

Heading.name: User Friendly Documentation
Heading.Info: Easy to read and understand for beginners
